page.title: 01SEAHAM HARBOUR,A SUMMARY
page.content: { {SEAHAM IS A MIXTURE OF BOTH URBAN AND {RURAL AREAS.ONLY FIVE MINUTES WALK {FROM THE INDUSTRIAL COLLIERIES AND {DOCK AREAS WE HAVE BEAUTIFUL {WOODLAND,PARKS,FIELDS AND FARMS. { FOR MANY YEARS THE COLLIERIES HAVE {PROVIDED THE BULK OF EMPLOYMENT IN {SEAHAM.SADLY,HOWEVER,THIS IS NO LONGER {THE CASE.MANY MALE SCHOOL LEAVERS {COULD,IN PREVIOUS YEARS,RELY UPON {EMPLOYMENT WITH THE NATIONAL COAL {BOARD BUT THEY MUST NOW EITHER BE {COUNTED WITH SEAHAM'S MANY JOBLESS {YOUNGSTERS OR MOVE AWAY IN AN ATTEMPT {TO FIND WORK. { THE SURROUNDING COUNTRYSIDE {HAS,ALONG WITH SEA FISHING,LONG BEEN A {MAJOR SOURCE OF RECREATION FOR SEAHAM {FAMILIES. } { THE FOLLOWING PAGES ON SEAHAM ARE {WRITTEN BY CHILDREN 7 TO 11 YEARS OLD.
